docs.lead_paragraph: They're expecting a baby, so they're deeply engressed in decorating a nursery, buying a layette, choosing a crib, a carriage, a changing table. They may be doing prepared childbirth exercises and perhaps even taking a course in patenting.

headline.main: Insurance for High-Risk Early Days Of the Newborn Baby's Fragile Life

docs.abstract: Amer Pediatrics Acad concludes 46th annual meeting with news conf on importance of health ins for high-risk early-days of newborn baby's life; crushing med bills for babies are now more common because sophisticated med tech is able to sustain life in imperiled newborns who would have died in the past; comments by acad program asst Thomas Robb, past pres Dr George M Wheatley, chmn Dr Donald Schiff, Morton Ament and Dr William C Ellis (M)
docs.snippet: They're expecting a baby, so they're deeply engressed in decorating a nursery, buying a layette, choosing a crib, a carriage, a changing table. They may be doing prepared childbirth exercises and perhaps even taking a course in patenting.
